title: Wholemeal Seeded Bread
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) bread flour', '175g (6 oz) wholemeal flour', '4 tablespoons polenta', '1 teaspoon salt', '15g (1/2 oz) fresh (compressed) yeast', '100ml (4 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '175ml (6 fl oz) warm milk (45 C)', '1 tablespoon pumpkin seeds', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds', '2 tablespoons semi skimmed milk', '2 tablespoons sunflower seeds']
